Description:
Verify that view properties works as appropriate for bookmarks,
      folders, and separators(negative)

Determine if the Bookmark Manager properly handles
      items dragged onto it.

Determine that it is possible to resize an image to it's original
        size after it has been resized to window size.
Determine whether a page with various formats prints properly

Determine if a page with aligned text prints as seen on
        screen
Determine if  top web sites print properly
Determine if windows media player works fine
Click down arrow to scroll page
